Allqoutes.text: Genius is one percent inspiration and ninety-nine percent perspiration.
Allqoutes.author: Thomas Edison, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: You can observe a lot just by watching.
Allqoutes.author: Yogi Berra, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: A house divided against itself cannot stand.
Allqoutes.author: Abraham Lincoln, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Difficulties increase the nearer we get to the goal.
Allqoutes.author: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Fate is in your hands and no one elses
Allqoutes.author: Byron Pulsifer, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Be the chief but never the lord.
Allqoutes.author: Lao Tzu, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Nothing happens unless first we dream.
Allqoutes.author: Carl Sandburg, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Life is a learning experience, only if you learn.
Allqoutes.author: Yogi Berra

Allqoutes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
Allqoutes.author: Buddha, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: What you give is what you get.
Allqoutes.author: Byron Pulsifer, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: We can only learn to love by loving.
Allqoutes.author: Iris Murdoch, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Life is change. Growth is optional. Choose wisely.
Allqoutes.author: Karen Clark, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: You'll see it when you believe it.
Allqoutes.author: Wayne Dyer, type.fit

Allqoutes.text: Today is the tomorrow we worried about yesterday.
Allqoutes.author: type.fit
